Name: market for cement, CEM II/A-L | cement, CEM II/A-L | EN15804GD, U
Category: C:Manufacturing/23:Manufacture of other non-metallic mineral products/239:Manufacture of non-metallic mineral products n.e.c./2394:Manufacture of cement, lime and plaster
Description: This activity represents the market for cement for Tunisia.  Such market activities involve the distribution of a product from its supplier to the consumer within a specific geographical region. As part of this market activity, transportation is also included, and the distances covered are given by the cement manufacturer.
